column4: raph, notice I connected the metro and tram lines to your station in hushley :)
That is H-Trans station not mine :)
Hi, total online noob here. Is there anything I absolutely have to know about multiplayer?
Like, not blowing up other peoples rail lines?
And if you want to do passengers, try to link up with one of the public stops
will give a lot of passengers
I never used the public player in my solo games.
Yes, no need to in solo games
But I can run my lines as usual, too?
Very handy in multi games though
OK, let me get some fresh coffee....
Yes, if you can find the room :)
hmm guessing you are not in europe if making coffee?
Oh, I am. I like coffee at night.
One other thing: I lose synchron. with the server every couple of minutes. Is that normal?
No not normal, although some days can be better than others. What type of connection do you have?
Dos Sim. use a lot of bandwidth?
I don't think so, but I know ppl on lower connections sometimes find it slow
I tend to leave the game running during the day at weekends and generally it doesn't disconnect
It does slow down a bit though as the number of vehicles increases
and we have a fair few now on this map
I'm running a few buses in Brassington (30,400) and I don'r get any passengers
Yes you need to link it up to the main network
The public player, or just any large stops?
Needs to be a public stop - can you connect up to Pottsborough?
Wait... now there are some. So it's just due to the large map and population. I get it now.
Will be very low volumes if you don't connect up
I'll go to Pottsborough. Can I connect to human player stops, too?
No, we can only share through the public ones
Main ones are in Crossington, Hepsborough, Torwell, Newchester, Culvington, Ashley Vale
although there are others as well
Have put in a road from Parston-on-Sea to Pottsborough for you
I've built one myself a minute ago, but lag is bad
It takes 30 sec or more for things to appear after I clicked them
Might be worth reconnecting, sometimes fixes the lag
Yeah, I've started delivering passengers to Potts for you
One more thing. I'm running apk128 2.0, not 1.99 as the server list asks
If it works I wouldn't worry :)
Could that be a reason for disconnecting?
let me see.let me check if I can send you more passangers too
Zook, I won't be adding any more stops myself around Potts so feel free to add if you want
heh, an airport eh Markohs, will have passengers coming out of our ears shortly :)
zook, route sa line over Upper Appsley aitrport
Zoosk, route sany line over the airport in Appsley
OK, I have. Did you build that?
Can I build a hangar there?
sure, go ahead, but already sending planesmyself
be careful not rouin your economy :)
Might have to build your own runway though
Ok I'm off, good luck Zook :)
Build your own runway to release the plane and use the public stops
Don't think you can build join runways unlike road
